*An S3 class for movement data*

The primary aim of the *aniframe* package is to provide an S3 data class that serves as the core data class in the *animovement* package.

## Installation

You can install the development version of *aniframe* with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages('aniframe', repos = c('https://roaldarbol.r-universe.dev', 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))
```

Once you have installed the package, you can load it with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library("aniframe")
```
